title: The Redemption of Man: The BloodWalkers
description: The last bloodline of a forgotten race, brought together by destiny, and drawn in to events prophesied before time began. They are the ones that walk the line between spirit and flesh, but can they stop the coming apocalypse? For Zach and his friends, high school was about sex, cigarettes, and heavy metal. But one night, an innocent play with a Ouija board would change their lives forever. Forced to live their lives with strange ties to the spirit world, his friends benefited and suffered. But after they are re-united, all Hell breaks loose. Through pain and suffering, can they find what it takes to stop something they donâ€™t understand? The gate must open. Horror story with graphic depictions of sexual encounters.
author: S. Michael Waldrop
